sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import { CustomFormText } from './element/CustomFormText'; import './account.css'; const AccountSignUp = () => { let navigate = useNavigate(); const [signUpFormData, setSignUpFormData] = useState({ idNotUsableReason: null, nickNotUsableReason: null, emailNotUsableReason: null, passwordNotUsableReason: null, passwordReTypeNotUsableReason: null, signUpFailedReason: null, }); return

계정 만들기

아이디 {signUpFormData.idNotUsableReason} 별칭 {signUpFormData.nickNotUsableReason} 이메일 {signUpFormData.emailNotUsableReason} 비밀번호 {signUpFormData.passwordNotUsableReason ? '비밀번호는 8자 이상, 대소문자/숫자/특수문자 중 2가지 이상의 조합으로 사용해주세요.' : ''} 비밀번호 확인 {signUpFormData.passwordReTypeNotUsableReason} {signUpFormData.signUpFailedReason}
; } export { AccountSignUp };
